overview: The plot outlines the story of the early Christian martyrs with a compendium of horrors such as maulings at the Colosseum, crucifixions, beheadings, savage hackings and burnings at the stake, burnings in the limepit, the spectacle of human torches in Nero's garden.

production_companies.name: Limelight Department of the Salvation Army, Melbourne

title: Soldiers of the Cross
